articles.author: Roger Gonzalez
articles.title: USMNT qualifies for World Cup: Don't let the loss to Costa Rica fool you, the future is bright for USA soccer - CBS Sports
articles.description: The Americans avoided a colossal defeat on Wednesday to punch their ticket to Qatar
articles.content: July 1, 2014 was the last time anybody saw the United States men's national team at a FIFA World Cup. It was a 2-1 defeat to Belgium in extra time in the round of 16 -- you know the one. Almost eight… [+3546 chars]

articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war may benefit Latin America crude producers in short term: panel - S&P Global
articles.description: The conflict in Ukraine has taught countries that they have to reduce their dependence on fossil fuels and accelerate the transition to clean sources of energy, experts said during a panel discussion
